00030 void* thread(void *) {
00031     PosixSemaphore mysem;

00033

00037         mysem.wait();

00040     }

00042 }

00044 int main() {

00046     
00047     pthread_create(&p,0,thread,NULL);
00048     
00049     cerr << "This master does not do gc() for the first 10000 objects." << endl;

00051
